overview: Subha Mitra, aged 70, eccentric, insomniac retired seamstress lady with a an independent and career oriented mind set. Her only hobby is knitting continuously and furiously reminiscent of the turmoil within her. In the twilight of her life she spends a lonely existence abandoned by her husband envious of anyone's relationship even if it was her own maid, thereby creating a wall around her that prevented any socializing. This wall is abruptly breached by an unexpected visitor ....of whom she looks upon.
title: Aakashee Pullover
